charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came across Giacomo
greeting everyone in an extra-loud voice.
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_0200_1: Oh, you wanna know why I’m doing this?
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_0300_1:
I guess it’s kinda like...a PR thing I’m doing to help
Team Star make a good impression.
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_0400_1:
I’m trying to be good about going around and
greeting folks to help break the ice so we can all
feel less like strangers.
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_0500_1:
Team Star only just started showing up on Pasio,
so it’s important to set the vibe, y’know?
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_0600_1:
That said, I’ve been up to more than just working
on Team Star PR stuff!
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_0700_1:
I’ve been DJing and holding guerrilla gigs on the
daily...
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_0800_1:
And I’ve been training with my partner Pokémon,
too—you know, really doin’ stuff for myself!
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_0900_1:
I’ve still got a long ways to go before I can call
any of these things a success, though.
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_1000_1:
In fact, one thing I’ve struggled with is raising my
partner Kingambit to be strong!
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_1100_1:
Kingambit here is a Pokémon I started training
after I took charge of the Segin Squad...
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_1200_1:
AKA the Dark crew. He used to be a Pawniard,
but he’s evolved since then.
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_1300_1:
And I also started training other Dark-type
Pokémon around then, too, not just Kingambit.
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_1400_1: It didn’t always go how I wanted, at first.
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_1500_1:
But I guess sticking to our training definitely helped
us get stronger, little by little.
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_1600_1:
Since I became the boss of the Dark crew, I
couldn’t go around looking pathetic in front of
the other members, y’know?
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_1700_1:
Anyways, it was tough, getting him to evolve into
Kingambit...
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_1800_1:
Eri coaches all of Team Star in battling, so I was
always asking for her advice until, finally, we
were able to pull it off.
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_0401_2000_1:
Yeah! Anyone who crosses us will be sweatin’
bullets!
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_0402_2200_1: Yeah, he sure acts like a boss, no doubt.
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_2300_1:
But...even though Kingambit has that strong “I’m a
boss” attitude...
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_2400_1:
he’s actually not that great at thinking through
complicated strategies.
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_2500_1:
He doesn’t sweat the details and just likes to push
through with brute force.
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_2600_1:
It’s kinda like how some musicians just start
ad-libbing after catching the audience’s vibe at
a concert.
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_2800_1:
don’t overthink it—just go with the flow and
have fun!
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_2900_1:
It’ll be a special concert featuring DJ Vice and
Kingambit!
charaepi_ch0327_00_pina/2301_1201_3000_1:
And if you wanna turn it into a battle of the
bands, we’re always down for that!
